title: Pork Loin
description: Here's how I do Pork Loin, based on advice from Two Fit Twins: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWAE56h2fnfzENVmQhW5Eyg
directions: Let rest outside of fridge for an hour before roasting
I usually throw in a handful of baby carrots or small potatoes
Roast for 5 1/2 minutes for every pound of pork used
Let rest in oven (without opening) for one hour
